// simple hook to detect mobile by breakpoint
import{useEffect,useState}from"react";export default function useIsMobile(){let breakpoint=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:900;const[isMobile,setIsMobile]=useState(()=>window.innerWidth<=breakpoint);useEffect(()=>{let t;const onResize=()=>{clearTimeout(t);t=setTimeout(()=>setIsMobile(window.innerWidth<=breakpoint),120);};window.addEventListener("resize",onResize);return()=>{clearTimeout(t);window.removeEventListener("resize",onResize);};},[breakpoint]);return isMobile;}
